title: You have been muted!
description: While muted we recommend you to check out our rules. You can find them in <#230654595767074817>.

fields.title: Precautions against getting muted in the future
fields.value: Having a good knowledge of the rules will prevent you from getting muted in the future, if you feel that you have been wrongfully muted you can contact a member of the staff team.

fields.title: Automation
fields.value: Some keywords might trigger an automatic mute, refrain from using them.

fields.title: Durations
fields.value: Mutes are not permanent and will expire after a set amount of time, after it has expired you are free to use the server once again.
